question: Which city is to host the 3rd Military Literature Festival?
explanation: Defence Minister Rajnath Singh will inaugurate the gala event on December 13,2019 at the Lake Club of Chandigarh. The event to be held from December 13 to 15 would present an international level forum to foster and preserve the exchange of knowledge related to military literature and associated works besides acquainting the youth with our glorious military heritage.
